website_summaries.verdict: Premium eye cream that envelops your eyes in comfort and erases fine lines.
pros: Boosted with super bio-hyaluronic acid and chlorella to decrease the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
Skin around the eyes becomes stronger and more dense compared to before
cons: Can be heavy on some skin types

customer_reviews.title: Not Shiseido product in jar
customer_reviews.text: This was not a Shiseido product in the jar...IT was some kind of white cream...I took it to Macy's Department store and they verified it was not a Shiseido product..It was too thin to white and had no odor...I would like s full refund and this fake product...
customer_reviews.author: Miriam T Macek

customer_reviews.title: FAKE CREAM!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Shiseido product. I have used this cream for long time, so I know how it looks, smells, and feels. This is not it. It's a white smelly cream. Also, all Shiseido products come in a box with a pamphlet written in various languages and a small spatula. This cream, came in an envelope and an used flat box right next to it. No pamphlet, no spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my mom. When she opened ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. When she opened it the product was frozen. After thawing it in room temperature the cream seemed to have separated in fluids and left chunky inconsistencies. She has used this cream for many years so she knows how it should be. She tried mixing it but didn't help much in the consistency. We reached out to BSD fragrances but they completely ignored me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best Night Cream Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best night cream I've used. After only three uses I wake up and skin feels so soft to the touch like a baby's bottom. I love it! I'm not going to use any other cream from now on.
customer_reviews.author: TVang

customer_reviews.title: One of the best product lines, EVERRR!
customer_reviews.text: I am living proof at 80 of how well these products work. Have used them since the 1980's, and I love what they do for me. Expensive, yes, but worth every penny. High quality ingredients do make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Me

customer_reviews.title: excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: this leaves skin feeling butter soft after the very first use. i put it on before applying make up and it has completely changed the texture of my skin over the past month great skin care line. great product. at first it seems greasy but it absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any kind of oily-ness. super soft and smells great a tiny bit is all you need. it goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: tankila ehsan

customer_reviews.title: Results surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Shiseido Benefiance for more than 30 years. A bit more expensive than the more popular face creams but definitely worth every penny. Many of my 'younger' friends often ask me what face cream I use. That in itself says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M Rey

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: My face is not dry in the morning. The cream is not greasy and you have to use just a little. I worry about lines on my forehead the most and I think the night cream really works.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Shiseido Benefiance, for over 20 years. People think I am half my age.
customer_reviews.author: Tortu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It makes my face feel like it's moisturized all night long, yet light-weight enough so I don't feel like my face has gunk on it. I love the scent as well and overall is a great product that has made me fall in love with Shiseido products.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: awful product
customer_reviews.text: I love all shiseido products, so I thought I'd give this a try. I recently just started using it at night and ever since, I'm breaking out every morning. Not just couple breakouts here and there but all over my face. It's horrific. At first, i didnt know what was causing it, but it was this night cream. I wanted to return because the whole bottle is left but I can't cuz the return window has closed :(
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lim

customer_reviews.title: Smoother looking sking
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far the best night cream I have tried! Leaves a smoother healthy looking skin without adding oil to it. I have been using it for years and no longer have done professional facials.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Perez

customer_reviews.title: The best for the eye.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eye cream forever, I have tried different brands in between, but then again this is the best moisturizer for the eye. Please believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Choidorj

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I got ripped off?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this is the original cream??? Or if it was replaced with Ponds? Smells different, texture is different. The feel if my face is different?? Anyone else experience this?
customer_reviews.author: Verenice Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Saves me a trip to the mall
customer_reviews.text: For a middle-aged woman of Asian origin, Shiseido works well for my skin. I have been using it for over a decade, but it is not available in regular drug stores, so I always had to drive to a mall to buy it. Found this on-line vendor, and the mailed-in cream looks and feels authentic. saves me a trip to the mall.
customer_reviews.author: XML

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice much chance in my fine lines, but I was only able to use this for a few weeks because it made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Johann W. Bodensteiner

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I bought it for my mum and she love it , so am continuously buying it
customer_reviews.author: NimRu

customer_reviews.title: Best product for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used this product. Love the texture and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... time cream and must say that it is really great product. I will continue to you this and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this night time cream and must say that it is really great product. I will continue to you this and night and use the day cream for the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Tri123

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for a number of years. It is a great facial stabilizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it gives me a very soft and glowing complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a must as it works and smells wonderful. My husband now uses it too :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nevena Novkovic

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I have used it for several years. I use the night cream for day and night, if it is good for night then it will be good for day use under my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Miller

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for asian’s skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product from shiseido. I bought this for my mom and i also used that a several times. It has a rich moisturizer and smooths my skin very well
customer_reviews.author: quinnyn

customer_reviews.title: Came used, not new
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package and the cream was already opened. Popped off the container and somebody definitely dipped their dirty finger in there to try it as shown by the picture attached. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: John Lo Giudice

customer_reviews.title: great service by global supplies
customer_reviews.text: great service by global supplies. I recommend them for your order. product is a must for my wife. she is old and HOT!
customer_reviews.author: PDRhound

customer_reviews.title: I have very dry skin, live in midwest winter ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin, live in midwest winter, still woke up with dry flakes on my skin, way too much fragrance, I would not purchase again,
customer_reviews.author: cynthia oneill

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product! It aborb well and seems to reduce appearance of large pores!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great face cream.!Been using it for years. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido eye cream
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product. I use it in the morning, and before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Dieterich

customer_reviews.title: I like it. The cream is smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Shiseido’s products for a long time, I like it. The cream is smooth, creamy, but not oily ---- absorbed well into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. But, like the texture of day cream more.
customer_reviews.author: Inge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cream is simply amazing plus affordable😂 Just got my second bottle yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Ppp

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today, it is opened and has a dirty outlook! I took the picture!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent successor to Skincare night moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I was heart-broken about the phasing out of their previous product (Skincare), and I am so happy I gave this one a chance. Same smell, same texture, really nice results on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: NZ

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido makes wonderful products. I order the product for my mother-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Shiseido makes wonderful products. I order the product for my mother-in-law. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E

customer_reviews.title: the best night cream for my face....
customer_reviews.text: I tried to go without using Shiseido night cream...big mistake! Why go without? Living in Northern Maine impossible to find Shiseido products so foolishly I thought I will go with a lesser brand. Then I went on Amazon and found Shiseido products...I will never go without again. Shiseido makes my face look and feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Wife has purchased this for years, and still loves it
customer_reviews.author: A. Bag

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: It works!! It moisturized my skin. Moreover, My face is also brightened and pink. I heard a lot of good reviews of Shiseido but this is the first time I try it and realized just now.
customer_reviews.author: Teadestiny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's shiseido and that's all, my skin is very happy
customer_reviews.author: Teona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the cream. Will order more in the future. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and does not absorb well
customer_reviews.text: First time to buy...thin consistency and does not absorb into the skin as other good creams I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1928

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for many years and have always been pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for many years and have always been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R. Crothers

customer_reviews.title: and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This product really enhanced my kin, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This product was not what i believed it would do!
customer_reviews.text: This product was smooth putting on at night however it seemed to stay on the surface not really penetrating skin which was the reason for my purchase and i hoped it would do and show a difference in my facial lines/neck. Really didn't seem to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but didn't care for the $40.00 plus that customs took.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love Sheseido! I've been using it for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Sheseido! I've been using it for years and honestly think it makes me look ten years younger. Their more expensive Future line is more dense and too thick for me. That might be good for people with VERY dry skin but for people with the "T-zone" or normal oily or normal dry skin the Benefiance line has been wonderful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer.

customer_reviews.title: This cream is nothing like the Shiseido products I’ve used in the past. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I used Shiseido for years in the past, but have used other products in recent years. I always loved their products and wanted to try it again. I previously used a day moisturizer serum but didn’t see the same product when I was looking so I ordered this night cream. I am disappointed because it’s nothing like the Shiseido products I’ve used in the past. It does not absorb into my skin. It’s real thick like some cheaper creams I’ve used and just stays on the surface of my face. I also noticed some redness after I used it. I’m not happy with this product at all. It’s not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who really loved how this made her face feel. Made it very smooth. The jar is very heavy and lovely. The cream is a lightweight cream that absorbs well. This was a gift for my mother who has both the day and night cream. She has tried a ton of skincare lines and likes the way Shiseido makes her skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Aubsmommmy

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a combination skin and this cream works perfectly for me. My forehead wrinkles reduce almost 50% or they are not so visible. I like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream before bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream before bed. Light smell and great feeling on my face. I will continue to buy this despite the high price. Also, a little goes a long way and they provide a nice applicator so you don't have to stick your fingers into the product
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Ceamy Night Version Excellent for Sensitve, Slightly Dry Skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that is now a bit dry. I've used the lighter weight night lotion for years, but now the cream version is a smoother option. I'm allergic to most sunscreen, daytime creams, so this is my morning and night go to. On second jar. It does empty faster than the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: R. Daily

customer_reviews.title: I must have in your life
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described I definitely recommend and for this price was amazing if the price changes and goes up .. that would be a terrible thing so keep it at your price and for sure I will be purchasing some more is amazing moisturizing hydrating eye recommended for mature skin especially
customer_reviews.author: BonitaMe

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face cream. For years I have used a different brand that cost around $35 for a jar. I'm a budget conscious person and decided to spend a little bit more and I was extremely glad I did. After applying this cream my face feels soft and not dry. I recommend it for anyone who has aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Effective cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite night cream. It is effective as my skin absorbs it quickly and feels smooth! I am fair and my skin is sensitive but Shiseido night cream is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mary_e5

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: This.... has taken the place of so many night time regimen. Not too leathery or creamy. Just right. And immediately you feel the skin filling 100 times better. Consistent use really reduces the visible wrinkles (for me its the forehead wrinkles).
customer_reviews.author: Lexington55

customer_reviews.title: An excellent night cream....
customer_reviews.text: An excellent night cream...rather heavy so apply it sparingly while your skin is still damp. I took the chance and used it around my eyes and had no reaction whatsoever. I will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Donata Cusano

customer_reviews.title: The Best Moisturizer for My Skin Type
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the lower price when I purchase it on Amazon. The seal is always intact and the packaging fine. It last about a month with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: KRK

customer_reviews.title: Not really Shiseido
customer_reviews.text: It does not feel like authentic sheseido. I used this product before and I usually buy from department stores. It feels different and smells different. There is no manual in the package also. I won’t buy from amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome love my products came early and better than me going to the stores and getting all that kaos Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Takenaga

customer_reviews.title: Generation gap!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said this is great. I think it is OK and pricey.
customer_reviews.author: N. U.

customer_reviews.title: Shisaido product is very good
customer_reviews.text: I use Shiseido day and night creams. It works good on my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshiko R.

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido
customer_reviews.text: I love Shiseido is a true miracle. Once u begin using it u have great results. I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: bren

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Shiseido. Proven ingredients and a long history of happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Bio Performance
customer_reviews.text: The cream is runny and not as good at providing hydration as Bio Performance. If you go for Shiseido, get Bio Performance.
customer_reviews.author: RRC

customer_reviews.title: Reliable beauty products
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Shiseido products for over 20 years and am never disappointed. They may cost a little more up-front but they last and make my skin feel like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it I really see a difference almost every week
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great night cream for you eyes. Keeps them moisturized all night long!
customer_reviews.author: carole davis

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: Great night cream for combination skin! It leaves my face feeling moisturized but not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exceptional product I had used in past, this price was inviting
customer_reviews.author: john siefert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful texture
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Absorbs quickly, and yet is very moisturizing. Smell is pleasant and not over-powering. Wake up in the morning with soft skin. Love the whole line, just wish it was less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Mtn Lover in CO

customer_reviews.title: Love it and it's not a fake
customer_reviews.text: For the price, which I can also purchase the same at the department store, I expected this to be authentic and it is. I'm glad I didn't have to make a trip out and it was delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Riding in Front Row

customer_reviews.title: I HATE THE SMELL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hated this! Hate the smell! (Like cheap perfume) Don’t think it works so well either. Doesn’t mean you won’t like it. (My friend and I like totally different products) But I will NEVER buy this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm using for a week and see the difference. I'm 60 + and people tell me that I look in 50's.
customer_reviews.author: sunlover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nice cream I like how smells. When I put it I feel my face very soft and smooth, I had both day, and night and it works , I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better night creams I've used
customer_reviews.text: One of the better night creams I've used. It has a nice scent and did not break me out. While it's a more expensive item, it lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sami L.

customer_reviews.title: Just a dab, nightly with great results..
customer_reviews.text: Although this line of products is spendy, it's well worth every cent because of the quality. And they last for quite a while because you use just a tiny amount with each application. Another huge plus, is that my sensitive skin has never shown any signs of irritation or inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy L. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this night cream. Its not oily like many others and spreads evenly and smells fresh. Good buy for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is gramma`s favorite cream. I bought it for her.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tanaka
